eprosima::rpc::strategy::ServerStrategyImpl

eprosima::rpc::strategy::ServerStrategyImpl Class Reference
[Server Module]

This class is the base of all classes that implement a server strategy. that could be used by the server. More...

Detailed Description

This class is the base of all classes that implement a server strategy. that could be used by the server.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void eprosima::rpc::strategy::ServerStrategyImpl::schedule ( boost::function< void()>  callback  )  [pure virtual]

This function schedules an incoming request. This function has to be implemented by the derived classes.

Parameters:
callback The Server's method to invoke when a request arrives.
